thread.title: Washington Technology Names Sev1Tech #12 on 2015 Fast 50 List
thread.title_full: Washington Technology Names Sev1Tech #12 on 2015 Fast 50 List

author: Tyler Scheidt
title: Washington Technology Names Sev1Tech #12 on 2015 Fast 50 List
text:
Sev1Tech, Inc., an industry leader in providing innovative IT, engineering, and program management services to government and commercial clients, announced today that Washington Technology recognized them as #12 on the Fast 50 list, which represents the fastest growing small businesses in the government contracting market. This is the first year that Sev1Tech has been recognized on this prestigious list. Washington Technology determines the Fast 50 by comparing annual growth rates from 2010 to 2014 for thousands of government contractor companies. To be considered, Washington Technology requires that companies meet the federal government criteria for a small business, that they be a member of the government’s 8(a) program, or be listed as a service-disabled, veteran, or women-owned small business.
On the list of small business federal, state, and local contractors, Sev1Tech earned its spot at #12 by achieving a 113.55% compound annual growth rate from 2010 through 2014. Sev1Tech’s growth is important because it allows for greater investment in its people, process, and technology thereby enhancing the quality of already outstanding customer solutions.
“Since the inception of Sev1Tech, we have focused on building a mission oriented culture served by the best people in the industry,” said Brian McIntyre, Chief Growth Officer of Sev1Tech. “Being named to the Washington Technology 2015 Fast 50 places our Sev1Tech family among the leaders and innovators in the Federal market. We are proud of each and every one of our people and their contribution to our corporate goals.”
Sev1Tech’s employee leadership has also been highlighted in the Washington Technology article, " Fast 50: Sev1Tech Sees Employee Leadership as Key to Success .” More information on Sev1Tech’s Fast 50 ranking and the complete results can be found here .
About Washington Technology
Washington Technology is the leading source of government contracting news. Home of the Top 100 and Fast 50 rankings, Washington Technology follows the public sector market, from the giants to emerging small businesses, covering important topics such as cybersecurity, cloud, big data, and other market trends.
About Sev1Tech
Sev1Tech, Inc. provides IT, engineering, and program management consulting services to U.S federal government agencies in defense, homeland security, intelligence, commerce, and justice departments as well as major commercial organizations and institutions. Founded in 2010 and headquartered in the Washington, D.C. metro area, Sev1Tech is well-known for its cyber-defense, virtualization, technical, data center, enterprise operations and applications, as well as management and strategic support services. Sev1Tech delivers excellence through highly qualified people, ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 27001:2005 certified processes, and innovative technology. For more information, visit http://www.Sev1Tech.com or follow us on Twitter or LinkedIn .
